title: [Bug]: outdated image in build instructions for docker / podman
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

The build instructions in CONTRIBUTING.md reference docker image node:14 which no longer works.

### What package are you using?

Built from source

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Clone the git repo 
2. Excecute per CONTRIBUTING.md: docker run -it --rm --volume .:/var/mnt:z -w /var/mnt/ node:14 /bin/bash -c "apt update && apt install -y rpm && npm ci && npm run dist:linux"
3. npm ci fails with "error Cannot read property '@homebridge/dbus-native' of undefined"
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. the app is being built correctly.
```

### Solution
I found that the referenced image "node:14" seems outdated. Replacing it with "node:20" leads to a successful build.
